Token.Abstract: Provides access to App-specific constants, specified in a plist file specified by the 'Constants_plist' setting in the App's main *-Info.plst file.
Creates and returns a UIColor object, initialized with the NSString loaded from the Constants plist file for the specified key.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The string which specifies the key to the Constants plist file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new UIColor object, configured according to the value in the Constants plist file.

Token.Abstract: Returns a BOOL value, initialized with the boolValue of the NSString loaded from the Constants plist file for the specified key.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The string which specifies the key to the Constants plist file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A BOOL value, configured according to the boolValue of the NSString in the Constants plist file.

Token.Abstract: Returns a double value, initialized with the doubleValue of the NSString loaded from the Constants plist file for the specified key.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The string which specifies the key to the Constants plist file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A double value, configured according to the boolValue of the NSString in the Constants plist file.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a UIFont object, initialized with the NSString objects loaded from the Constants plist file for the specified key.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The string which specifies the key to the Constants plist file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new UIFont object, configured according to the value in the Constants plist file.

Token.Abstract: Returns a CGSize value, initialized with the floatValue of the NSString objects loaded from the Constants plist file for the specified key.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The string which specifies the key to the Constants plist file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new CGSize value, configured according to the value in the Constants plist file.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns a NSString object, initialized with the NSString object loaded from the Constants plist file for the specified key.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The string which specifies the key to the Constants plist file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new NSString object, configured according to the value in the Constants plist file.

Token.Abstract: Returns the NSDictionary of a plist file (loaded the first time) specified by the 'Constants_plist' setting in the App's main *-Info.plst file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new NSDictionary object, loaded with all of the keys/values in the Constants plist file.

Token.Abstract: Returns a NSObject object, initialized with the object loaded from the Constants plist file for the specified key. If the specified key doesn't exist, a warning message is logged to the console.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The string which specifies the key to the Constants plist file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new NSString object, configured according to the value in the Constants plist file.
